title: How to write a letter to someone you haven't seen in years - Quora

response.answer_text: I would just think about good times with the person, then open your heart, grab a pen or a keyboard, and write what comes out without self-censuring or worry. When you have done this, don"t hit SEND or stuff it in an envelope (DO print it out so you don't lose it.) Let it marinate for a day, re-read it, edit in whatever way seems best, and send it out. With any luck you'll gain a new old friend
